methods.name: public void addCapabilitiesToEnableForTech(int capabilities, @ImsRegistrationImplBase.ImsRegistrationTech int radioTech)
methods.comment:
* Add one or many capabilities to the request to be enabled.
     *
     * @param capabilities A bitfield of capabilities to enable, valid values are defined in
     *   {@link MmTelFeature.MmTelCapabilities} and {@link RcsFeature.RcsImsCapabilities}.
     * @param radioTech  the radio tech that these capabilities should be enabled for, valid
     *   values are in {@link ImsRegistrationImplBase.ImsRegistrationTech}.

methods.name: public void addCapabilitiesToDisableForTech(int capabilities, @ImsRegistrationImplBase.ImsRegistrationTech int radioTech)
methods.comment:
* Add one or many capabilities to the request to be disabled.
     * @param capabilities A bitfield of capabilities to diable, valid values are defined in
     *   {@link MmTelFeature.MmTelCapabilities} and {@link RcsFeature.RcsImsCapabilities}.
     * @param radioTech the radio tech that these capabilities should be disabled for, valid
     *   values are in {@link ImsRegistrationImplBase.ImsRegistrationTech}.

methods.name: public List<CapabilityPair> getCapabilitiesToEnable()
methods.comment: * @return a {@link List} of {@link CapabilityPair}s that are requesting to be enabled.

methods.name: public List<CapabilityPair> getCapabilitiesToDisable()
methods.comment: * @return a {@link List} of {@link CapabilityPair}s that are requesting to be disabled.

methods.name: private void addAllCapabilities(Set<CapabilityPair> set, int capabilities, int tech)
public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void addCapabilitiesToEnableForTech(int capabilities, @ImsRegistrationImplBase.ImsRegistrationTech int radioTech)
public void addCapabilitiesToDisableForTech(int capabilities, @ImsRegistrationImplBase.ImsRegistrationTech int radioTech)
